text.div:
Code System "ACME codes for ordering Hepatitis testing": This is an fictions example CodeSystem.

Developed by: Australian Digital Health Agency Connectathon team (example)

Published for testing on 29-April 2016

This Code System includes all the ACME codes for ordering Hepatitis testing:

CodeDisplayDefinition
HepAIgMAbHepatitis A IgM AbHepatitis A virus antibody, IgM type
HepATAbHepatitis A total AbHepatitis A virus antibody, total measurement
HepBCIgMAbHepatitis B core IgM AbHepatitis B core IgM level
HepBCTAbHepatitis B core total AbHepatitis B core antibody measurement
HepBeAbHepatitis B e AbHepatitis B e antibody level
HepBeAgHepatitis B e AgHepatitis B e antigen test
HepBHepatitis B serologyHepatitis B screening
HepBsAbHepatitis B surface AbHepatitis B surface antibody level
HepBsAgHepatitis B surface AgHepatitis B surface antigen level
HepCHepatitis C serologyHepatitis C antibody test
HepSerologyHepatitis serologyHepatitis panel measurement

name: ACME Pathology ordering codes for Hepatitis B testing
description: This is an example CodeSystem of all ACME pathology ordering codes for hepatitis.

concept.definition: Hepatitis A virus antibody, IgG type
Hepatitis A virus antibody, IgM type
Hepatitis A virus antibody, total measurement
